about_the_game:
Have you ever seen a cowboy figure mounted on a cute dog to save the day? Now it’s YOUR time to be the toy you love, drive a vehicle and compete for points, prizes, and glory in an exciting and exceptional place where childhood memories, imagination, and sporting action get together. Prepare your engines, and let the Toy Sports begin!

Based on the original concept created by Gixer Entertainment, Toy Sports is a fun party game for the whole family. It is an online multiplayer game where you control your favorite Toy while you compete to see who can score the most points! Points are scored by throwing your toy from the vehicle at the targets - goals, hoops, holes, bowling pins, and baskets, among many others.

Besides a toy, choose a vehicle and compete in arenas that refer to fun, colorful, and cute places, such as a world made of candy or an amusement park. But make no mistake, there is a time limit and everyone and everything will try to stop you.

Toy Sports is an engaging party game for all ages. Run! Flip! Fly! Shoot! Drive! Earn points! Challenge your friends!

Features:

- Up to 30 players competing together in a fun online arena to see who will score more points.

- Pick your favorite childhood toy to be your avatar!

- Choose a funny vehicle for your toy: how about a rocket? A pony? Or even a dragon! Maybe you will prefer the duck in a bathtub.

- Try to score points by jumping from the vehicle and messing with the physics.

- Play like a kid again! Gather the family and friends to play together and have a lot of fun!

name: Toy Sports
short_description: With Toy Sports, you will return to an exciting and very special place: your childhood memories. Now it is YOUR time to be the toy you love, drive cars, compete in various sports for points, prizes and glory. Prepare your engines and play with the whole family!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
